Nerangs.ab: aētat̰.tē zōhr čahār angust az āb ul dārišn ud barsom čahār angust az zōhr ul dārišn
"At aētat̰ tē, he has to hold the zōhr four fingers away from water and the barsom four fingers away from zōhr."
aētat̰.tē zōhr čahār angust az āb ul dārišn barsom čahār angust az zōhr ul dārišn ahurāne ahurahe zōhr andak pad harw wāzag-ē andar āb rēxtan aŋ́he auuaiiąm dąmahi

"At aētat̰ tē, he has to hold the zōhr four fingers away from water and the barsom four fingers away from zōhr. At ahurāne ahurahe, he has to pour a little of zōhr into the water at each word (and continue with) aŋ́he auuaiiąm dąmahi"
